trans-unit.source: Specifies the reason that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o motivo que um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> controlo foi fechado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because an application was launched.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> controlo foi fechado porque uma aplicação foi iniciada.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because another application has received the focus.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> controlo foi fechado porque outra aplicação recebeu o foco.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close*> method was called.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> controlo foi fechado porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close*>método foi chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close*>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because one of its items was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> controlo foi fechado porque um dos seus itens foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> control was closed because of keyboard activity, such as the ESC key being pressed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> controlo foi fechado devido a atividade de teclado, tal como a tecla ESC que está a ser premida.
